sections.content:
Question:
I am using RH850/F1KM-S4 with MCAL package provided by Renesas. Do I need to get a different MCAL package for F1KM-S2?
Answer:
No, All RH850/F1KM devices share the same MCAL package. It supports Autosar Release R4.2.2. Compiler used is GHS V6.1.6 v2015.1.7. MCAL developed as SEooC compliant to ISO26262 standard.
Suitable Products
RH850/F1Kx
